#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

int comunal(int a, int b)
{
  return b==0 ? a : comunal(b,a%b);
}

int main()
{

  int t,x1,x2,y1,y2;

  scanf("%d", &t);
  while(t--)
  {
    scanf("%d%d%d%d", &x1, &x2, &y1, &y2);
    printf("%d\n", abs(x1-y1)+abs(x2-y2)-comunal(abs(x1-y1),abs(x2-y2)));
  }

  return 0;
}
